revised_title: Investigations on Spark Discharge from Metallic Poles in Water
tldr: The author examines the spark discharge from metallic poles in water and its effect on the spectra of various metals. The study reveals that the spectra of metals in water-spark discharge exhibit broadened and reversed lines, which are similar to the spectra of new stars. The phenomenon is attributed to pressure, which causes the duplication and broadening of lines in the spectra of new stars.
